New Records: Luka Modrić made his 180th appearance for Croatia, a national team record
Key Match Events: Croatia scored a free-kick goal by Luka Modrić in the 51st minute
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Zlatko Dalić made five changes to the starting lineup, including Igor Matanović's debut
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Zlatko Dalić praised the team's resilience and highlighted the importance of future matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia dominated possession with 58% in the first half and had numerous chances
